page.title: 16Religion
page.content: St. Paul's Church of England Church in Croxton is served by the same vicar as the parishes of Broughton and Adbaston. Services are alternated between Croxton Church and Broughton Church. There is a burial ground attached to the church which is still used and which is well tended. The church itself is well looked after and the grounds are neatly kept. There is a small Methodist Chapel in Windmill Lane, Croxton. Regular services are held there, together with a Sunday School for the children. Weddings, Christenings and Burials take place at both the Church and the Chapel.
